prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a mystical horse with flowing mane and dark colors.
I want a shadowy Pokemon inspired by a horse, featuring ethereal elements and a haunting presence.
Generate an elegant Pokemon that embodies the essence of the night, with a dark and mysterious aura.
Make a mythical steed Pokemon that has a flowing mane and a ghostly appearance, evoking a sense of wonder.
Imagine a dark-type horse Pokemon with a spectral design and a majestic yet eerie vibe.
Design a unique Pokemon that blends equine features with ghostly elements, showcasing an otherworldly beauty.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the elegance of a horse with the mystery of the supernatural.
